title: U.S. approved high-level radioactive waste storage

content.question: Which of the following is the current recommendation of Congress for the permanent storage of high-level radioactive waste in the United States?

choices.label: Burial deep underground at sites remote from population centers
Storage in huge pools of water at the nuclear plants where they are produced
Storage in concrete and steel casks, above ground in air-cooled buildings, at nuclear plants where they are produced
Storage deep in the Antarctic ice sheet and burial beneath the ocean floor
Injection deep underground in remote areas between impervious layers of shale and clay

content.answer: Burial deep underground at sites remote from population centers
